name: Repair Brothers
description:
Two Brothers, a Repairman, a Shopkeeper, in a Repair Shop. Your objective? Repair anything people will ask you to. Why? Because living can be expensive. The shopkeeper may manage money, clients and resources, while his brother only bothers with diagnosing and repairing orders. But beware, your shop is small, space is limited and passing objects from one to another will sometimes be difficult...

2 players game
